Entries.Dylan: Dear @,^  This is a pineapple. It's your problem now.^   -Dylan  %item object 832 1 %%[#]A Gift From Dylan

Entries.spring_20_1: Dear @,^  Please bring me a geode. Just a standard geode. I love cracking those things open.^   -Dylan  %item quest 1200 %%[#]Dylan Mail Quest
Entries.summer_19_1: Dear @,^  I would like a poppy. Could you grow one for me? Don't ask what it's for.^   -Jacob  %item quest 1201 %%[#]Jacob Mail Quest
Entries.fall_2_1: Hey @,^  Give me cheese.^   -SKYE  %item quest 1202 %%[#]Skye Mail Quest
Entries.winter_9_1: Dear @,^  Would you please bring me an aquamarine? I need it for an alchemical recipe.^   From,^     Kurtis  %item quest 1203 %%[#]Kurtis Mail Quest
Entries.spring_10_2: Dear @,^  Could you bring me a bottle of wine? I'll pay you well for it.^Sincerely,^  Shelby  %item quest 1204 %%[#]Shelby Mail Quest
Entries.summer_13_2: @,^  Could you get me a jasper? I know they're kind of hard to get, but I'll pay you. I need it for an art project.^ I hear you can find it in magma geodes.^   -Anastasia  %item quest 1205 %%[#]Ana Mail Quest
Entries.fall_3_2: Hello, @^  I need 25 blackberries for a recipe. Can you get them to me?^   -Zech  %item quest 1206 %%[#]Zech Mail Quest
Entries.winter_11_2: Dear @,^  This winter weather is making me crave a fish stew. Could you bring me one?^ Your friend,^   Ross  %item quest 1207 %%[#]Ross Mail Quest
Entries.spring_11_3: Greetings,^  I require 100 coffee for a brew I'm working on. Please bring them to me at your earliest convenience. I will reward you handsomely.^   -David S.R.  %item quest 1208 %%[#]David Mail Quest

Entries.1200: ItemDelivery/Dylan's Geode/Dylan wants you to bring him a geode so he can crack it open at Clint's./Bring Dylan 1 geode./Dylan 535/-1/400/-1/Cancellable/Hey, you got it! Thanks. Time to find out what's inside!$h
Entries.1201: ItemDelivery/Jacob's Poppy Procurement/Jacob wants you to bring him a poppy. His reasons are his own./Bring Jacob a poppy./Jacob 376/-1/550/-1/Cancellable/Perfect! That's the good stuff. Here's the money. Take it.
Entries.1202: ItemDelivery/Cheese for Skye/Skye demands cheese./Bring Skye a cow's cheese./Skye 424/-1/1199/-1/Cancellable/Thanks! I'm so going to revour this tonight.
Entries.1203: ItemDelivery/Alchemical Aquamarine/Kurtis requires an aquamarine for an alchemy project./Bring Kurtis an aquamarine./Kurtis 62/-1/600/-1/Cancellable/Thanks! This is perfect. Here's your reward.$h
Entries.1204: ItemDelivery/Wine for Shelby/Shelby will pay well for a bottle of wine./Bring Shelby a bottle of wine./Shelby 348/-1/5000/-1/Cancellable/Oh, this looks lovely! I'm excited to try it! Here's the money, as promised.$h
Entries.1205: ItemDelivery/Jasper for Ana/Ana would like some jasper for an art project. You can find jasper in magma geodes./Bring Ana a jasper./Ana 563/-1/900/-1/Cancellable/Hey, this is nice! Here's your reward!$h
Entries.1206: ItemDelivery/Blackberries for Zech/Zech wants some blackberries./Bring Zech 25 blackberries./Zech 410 25/-1/6000/-1/Cancellable/Thanks, man! Here's your reward.$h
Entries.1207: ItemDelivery/Soup for Ross/Ross wants fish stew./Bring Ross a fish stew./Ross 728/-1/2100/-1/Cancellable/Oh my goodness, that looks so good! Here's the money. Give me that!$h
Entries.1208: ItemDelivery/Ultimate Cold Brew/David wants 100 brewed coffees. He'll pay very well for them./Bring David 100 coffees./David 395 100/-1/55000/-1/Cancellable/Gott in Himmel! You brought it all! How are you holding so many mugs?! Here's the payment, as promised.$h

Entries.Sun: I'm glad to have found an apprentice in Kurtis. He has a keen sense for the arcane.#$e#Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue. I trust Kurtis to carry on that task.

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 30 76 right/David 31 76 left/Zech 24 70 down/Shelby 23 71 right/Skye 44 60 left/Kurtis 26 68 left/Jacob 25 71 left/Ana 26 62 up/Dylan 43 60 right
Entries.Ross: My money's on Jas.#$b#I think she has it in her to win.#$b#She's been training for this moment.
Entries.David: I painted those eggs.#$b#The paint isn't edible.#$b#Don't get any ideas.$s
Entries.Zech: It's pretty cool that our community comes together for events like this.$h
Entries.Shelby: I'm concerned about how long Ana's been at that buffet.#$b#Last year she went into an egg coma.$s
Entries.Shelby_2: I swear, if Ana goes into another egg-induced coma...$s
Entries.Skye: The grass is still all dewy from this morning.#$b#It's going to be a soggy egg hunt.
Entries.Kurtis: Aren't eggs like a symbol of rebirth?#$b#Someone could make a religion out of this.
Entries.Jacob: My, what a lovely day!#$b#Perfect day for an egg hunt.
Entries.Ana: If there's one day of the year to eat eggs, it's today.#$b#I bet you I can finish that whole plate!$h
Entries.Dylan: I'm just glad I get the day off of work today.$h

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 21 41 right/David 22 41 left/Zech 9 38 up/Shelby 10 38 left/Skye 25 20 down/Kurtis 13 20 right/Jacob 1 39 right/Ana 26 37 right/Dylan 24 21 right
Entries.Ross: I'm not much of a dancer.
Entries.David: I'm trying to get Ross to dance with me.#$b#I've been known to set fires to dance floors.$h
Entries.Zech: All the food is super cold.$s#$b#And that gelatin looks like it's about to fly away.
Entries.Shelby: This festival is gorgeous!$h#$b#I appreciate all the effort everyone put into it!$h
Entries.Skye: I'm staying as far away from the dancing as possible!$s
Entries.Kurtis: Alex, why do you have to be like this? You're being so problematic right now.$s
Entries.Jacob: So many pastel colors!#$b#I should have worn a nicer shirt.$s
Entries.Dylan: I can't believe I was able to drag Skye here!#$b#I'm not so sure we're having a good time, though.

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 47 18 left/David 31 4 down/Zech 48 19 down/Shelby 29 9 left/Skye 24 14 down/Kurtis 18 9 left/Jacob 35 11 down/Ana 28 9 right/Dylan 11 11 right
Entries.David: It's not every day that you get to meet the governor!$h
Entries.Zech: This meat has my full attention.
Entries.Shelby: I think this stew is a lovely idea.#$b#There are so many diverse ingredients in this valley.#$b#It's going to make for a great soup!$h
Entries.Skye: I'm going to beat this drum so hard.$s
Entries.Jacob: It looks so good!#$b#Don't muck it up!
Entries.Ana: This soup sounds like a terrible idea.#$b#Imagine all the terrible things you can put into the soup!#$b#Vanilla extract? Baking powder? Cocoa powder?#$b#Wait, those are all ingredients to make chocolate cake.

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 34 36 down/David 35 36 down/Zech 28 36 down/Shelby 29 36 down/Skye 25 36 down/Kurtis 10 39 down/Jacob 14 38 right/Ana 19 24 down/Dylan 26 36 down
Entries.Ross: This is going to be so beautiful!$h
Entries.David: To witness bioluminescence tonight...#$b#We are very lucky!$h
Entries.Zech: What a relaxing night.#$b#Just listen to those waves.
Entries.Skye: Bruh, when are these jellyfish going to show up?#$b#I want to see them!$s
Entries.Kurtis: It's a little brisk tonight.#$b#Fall is almost here.
Entries.Jacob: The water is so calm tonight.#$b#Freaky.
Entries.Ana: These jellyfish are beautiful.#$b#I vow to paint them from memory later.#$b#Art imitates life, and all that.

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 32 73 left/David 38 77 left/Zech 24 64 up/Shelby 62 67 left/Skye 41 62 up/Kurtis 49 88 down/Jacob 28 34 up/Ana 57 68 right/Dylan 31 73 right
Entries.Ross: Just one more round on orange.#$b#I swear, this will be the big winner!#$e#Wait...#$b#I'm out of tokens already.$s
Entries.David: Look at these weapons!#$b#I'm more of an épée guy, myself.
Entries.Zech: Just one more try! I know I can get the high score!
Entries.Skye: Marnie's stand is really impressive!$h#$e#I hope she wins this year.
Entries.Kurtis: She told me that I'm going to die soon.$s#$e#I want my money back and I hate it here.$s
Entries.Ana: Oh no. Shelby has climbed into the chicken enclosure again.$s#$e#She just really loves birds.
Entries.Dylan: I'm telling you, man. You need to bet on green every time!
Entries.Jas: Why does that lady get to pet the birds and not me?

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 27 19 right/David 13 16 left/Zech 10 29 down/Shelby 40 30 right/Skye 33 11 right/Kurtis 23 27 left/Jacob 36 15 right/Ana 22 48 right/Dylan 24 69 down
Entries.Ross: David! DAVID!#$b#Dangit. I've lost sight of him.$s#$e#We were supposed to be doing this together!$s
Entries.David: What does this mean?#$e#I feel like I'm really close to getting it.
Entries.Zech: I'm just going in circles, aren't I?$s
Entries.Shelby: It's got my foot!$s#$b#You're going to have to push past me.#$e#Don't worry about me. I'm a lost cause.
Entries.Skye: Boo!$h#$e#Did I scare you?$h#$b#I heard you coming around the corner.$h#$e#How'd I get here?#$b#I just jumped over the hedge.#$e#I miiiight be stuck here now.$s
Entries.Kurtis: What she said.#$e#I cannot handle this right now.$s
Entries.Jacob: Huh... whuh?#$b#How long have I been here?#$e#I'm losing track of time.
Entries.Ana: No way, man. I am NOT going in there!$s#$b#I do NOT do well with scary stuff!$s
Entries.Dylan: I don't know who brought this pumpkin pie, but it's delicious!$h

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 81 31 left/David 80 26 down/Zech 80 31 down/Shelby 48 29 left/Skye 61 25 down/Kurtis 61 33 down/Jacob 68 16 up/Ana 67 21 up/Dylan 62 25 down
Entries.Ross: Does %pet enjoy the cold weather?#$b#Pets can be the funniest things.
Entries.David: I'm about to pelt Zech with a snowball.
Entries.Zech: It's nice to hang out with all the other villagers.#$b#Festivals are so much fun!$h#$b#I feel like nothing bad is going to happen.$h
Entries.Shelby: The forest looks so different in the winter.#$e#It's so quiet out here.
Entries.Skye: I claim this igloo as my own.#$b#You are not allowed inside!$s
Entries.Kurtis: I could really go for some hot cocoa.
Entries.Jacob: I'm really digging Leah's sexy mermaid sculpture.$h
Entries.Ana: Is no one else seeing how amazing this is?!#$b#Robin is building a freaking castle!$h#$b#Out of ice!$h#$b#Like a fully detailed castle!$h#$b#You can see hundreds of individual ice-bricks!$h#$e#Just look at her go.
Entries.Dylan: Skye and I built this igloo together.#$b#You can go inside if you want.$h

Entries.Set-Up_additionalCharacters: Ross 25 67 down/David 24 67 down/Zech 22 71 right/Shelby 23 72 up/Skye 36 59 down/Kurtis 27 73 up/Jacob 24 74 up/Ana 31 72 up/Dylan 37 60 left
Entries.Ross: I made a green bean casserole!$h#$b#Nobody's touched it, though...$s
Entries.David: I brought my own peppermint mocha.#$b#Even on a day like today, I'm going to have my midday coffee!$h
Entries.Zech: Ooftah. I'm stuffed...$s#$b#But I want thirds...
Entries.Shelby: I have gift-giving down to a science.
Entries.Skye: I'm freezing out here!$s#$b#I should have brought a coat!$s
Entries.Kurtis: What are you hoping to get as a present?#$b#Hold on, let me feel your aura.#$e#I'm sensing that you want %favorite.#$b#Am I right?$h
Entries.Jacob: I could listen to Gus for hours.#$b#He's so knowledgeable!$h
Entries.Ana: Look at all those decorations and gifts!$h#$b#I'm so PUMPED!$h#$b#And I KNOW that Haley's going to love what I got for her!$h
Entries.Dylan: I'm so ready for all this snow to melt.#$b#I was not built for this weather.$s#$e#I feel like my nose is going to fall off.$s
